short_summary: Amendment to the response deadline closing time for the National Food and Beverage Procurement Strategy Renewal (NFBPS)
description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is amending the response deadline closing time for the National Food and Beverage Procurement Strategy (NFBPS) renewal process. The required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on April 1, 2024 by 14:00 EDT. This is not a call for tender or a Request for Standing Offers (RFSO).
tags: Positions remaining vacant especially during weekends and CBSA  not provide amp
full_summary:
### National Food and Beverage Procurement Strategy Renewal

#### Tender Reference
WS4290897476-Doc4290923663, Amendment 3

#### Closing Date
Monday, 1st April 2024, 14:00 HAE (Eastern Daylight Time)

#### Description
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites feedback and recommendations from the food industry in regards to the renewal of the National Food and Beverage Procurement Strategy (NFBPS). The strategy was previously updated in 2019.

This Request for Information (RFI) is not a call for tender, nor is it a request for standing offers (RFSO). No agreement or contract will be entered into based on this RFI.

Please note that the published closing date is not the final deadline for comments or input. Stakeholders may submit feedback at any time prior to the publication of a follow-up renewal for the National Food and Beverage Procurement Strategy.

#### Key Information
* The renewed strategy is anticipated to commence on an undetermined date, with the current contract scheduled to end on 1st April 2025.
* Procurement for this contract is classified as "Competitive - Selective tendering" based on the Unified Standards for Procurement (UNSPSC) categories 50000000 (Food Beverage and Tobacco Products) and 73130000 (Food and beverage industries).
* This RFI is issued on behalf of all federal departments and agencies by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), Ontario Region.
* The main contact for this RFI is Pan, Long (SPAC/PSPC) at long.pan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca or by phone at [insert phone number].

#### Supporting Documents
All requested documentation must be submitted on or before 1st April 2024, 14:00 HAE. Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time.

#### Previous Updates and Announcements
A follow-up email with subsequent developments will be issued after this RFI has expired.

Please note that attached are the pertinent documentation:
[Refer to attached documentation]*** 
(Note: Other such resources and/or pay requirements aren't investigated here.)
